metadata.titel_preek: Lass mich Dein Esel sein, Christus

primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The preacher seeks to redefine the role of the believer as a humble yet essential carrier of Christ into the world, using the donkey of the Palm Sunday entry as the central metaphor.

tekstueel_bewijs: die das Neue Leben jetzt und hier schon anfangen

object.identificatie: The Mediation of Christ/Kingdom of God
tekstueel_bewijs: auf dem Du zu all diesen Menschen kommst

zender.identificatie: The Spirit/The Example of Dom Helder Camara
tekstueel_bewijs: da muss man ja tatsächlich den Heiligen Geist im Spiel vermuten
Das hat Dom Helder Camara gesagt

ontvanger.positie_hoorder: Does hearer identify with Subject or Receiver?

tekstueel_bewijs: Eins sein mit allem, was lebt
helper.rol_van_god: God is the passenger (Object/Passive Subject), not the primary actor.

tegenstander.identificatie: Human Pride and Separation from Creation
tekstueel_bewijs: Sucht nach Trennung von den Mitgeschöpfen
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is primarily a psychological or social attitude (pride/elitism) rather than a cosmic force of sin.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The act of interpreting/praying the text correctly.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Preacher/Hearer
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The secondary program (how to read the text) serves as the gateway to the primary program (being the donkey).

actantieel_schema_visualisatie.zender_naar_ontvanger: Spirit → Mediation of Christ → The People

voorbeelden_god_subject: Christus kommt nicht anders als durch solche Esel
voorbeelden_mens_subject: Wir glauben, dass Christus einreiten kann

Bedürfnis, das man nur mit großer Anstrengung... los wird

Christus kommt nicht anders als durch solche Esel wie dich und mich

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon is a recruitment of the will. It focuses on the desire to be useful to God.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: Resolution is found in the 'Abrahamic minority' who choose the low path.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: S2 is treated as a social/psychological error rather than a state of spiritual death.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: While using the language of 'prayer' and 'Christ', the structural engine is anthropocentric. Christ is dependent on human agency ('Christus kommt nicht anders als durch solche Esel').

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: die das Neue Leben jetzt und hier schon anfangen

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: da muss man ja tatsächlich den Heiligen Geist im Spiel vermuten

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Dom Helder Camara and the 'friendly beasts' are used as models for the hearer to emulate.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Focus on Christ who chooses the lowly, rather than the lowly who allow Christ to use them.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Pressure to be 'humble enough' to be useful.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Synergism: God's entry into the world is contingent on human cooperation.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The metaphor is consistent, but the theological hierarchy is inverted.
spanning_punten: The claim that Christ 'cannot come otherwise' vs. Divine Sovereignty.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: Christus... vermittelt lässt in unser Leben

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The Spirit is a 'suspicion' rather than the source of power.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Sin is seen as 'Sucht nach Trennung' (addiction to separation).

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon makes the human 'donkey' the Subject of the mission, making Christ the Object/Passenger dependent on human humility.

subject_herpositionering.huidige_probleem: The human is the subject of 'carrying' and 'beginning' the new life.
subject_herpositionering.voorgestelde_herpositionering: Make Christ the Subject who chooses and empowers the donkey.
subject_herpositionering.voorbeeld_revisie: Instead of 'Let me be your donkey,' use 'Christ chooses even a donkey to manifest His glory.'

identificatie_herstel.problematische_identificatie: Hearer as the 'necessary' helper of God.
identificatie_herstel.strategie: Focus on the wonder that Christ comes to us, rather than how we bring Him.

modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Emphasize that we *cannot* be humble on our own; it is a gift.

tegenstander_intensivering.voorgestelde_intensivering: Address the radical inability of the human to 'carry' God.
tegenstander_intensivering.theologische_rationale: Without a 'Heavy Opponent' (Sin), the 'Donkey' becomes a hero of humility.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.probleem: Ethics (being a donkey) precedes Soteriology (Christ's coming).
narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: Christ comes (Soteriology) -> Therefore we are freed to serve (Ethics).

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: The metaphor is poetically strong but structurally risks making the Gospel dependent on human virtue.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorically, the sermon is humble; actantially, it is anthropocentric.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis would focus on Zechariah 9:9; this focuses on a modern archbishop's quote.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas reveals that the 'Donkey' is actually the 'Hero' (Subject) of this narrative.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a classic example of 'Exemplarism' where a saint's prayer replaces the divine act.
